item.title: Jeth Ott: Lutheran, Sober, and Bar Owner? [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Jeth Ott in studio. Jeff is the owner of The Little Brown Jug, and iconic destination bar and restaurant in the small farming village of Maybee, Michigan. They discussed his sobriety, his testimony, and what nit means to be a believer that owns a business in that space. Jeth's passion and excitement for his craft comes through the mic on this episode. Enjoy!
